cards.title: Emergency Food Package
cards.description: 10 kg of rice , 5 cans of beans,5 cans of tuna,5 packets of instant noodles,1 liter of cooking oil
cards.reason: To provide immediate sustenance to families affected by the disaster.

cards.title: Clean Water Supply
cards.reason: To ensure access to safe and clean drinking water for hygiene and hydration.

cards.title: Hygiene Essentials Kit
cards.description: 2 bars of soap,1 toothpaste,1 toothbrush,1 pack of sanitary napkins
cards.reason: To promote good hygiene practices and prevent the spread of diseases.

cards.title: Warm Blanket
cards.reason: To provide warmth and comfort during cold nights.

cards.title: Baby Care Package
cards.description: 20 diapers,2 packs of baby wipes,5 jars of baby food,1 baby blanket
cards.reason: To cater to the special needs of infants and young children.

cards.title: First Aid Kit
cards.description: 1 first aid kit (bandages, antiseptic, pain relievers),1 thermometer,5 surgical masks
cards.reason: To provide immediate medical assistance in case of injuries or emergencies.

extra_data.reason: To support children's education and learning continuity during crisis situations.
To provide temporary shelter to displaced families or individuals.
To ensure the welfare of pets and animals affected by disasters.
To facilitate cooking and food preparation for affected individuals or communities.
To promote personal cleanliness and hygiene practices for overall health and well-being.
To provide illumination during power outages or emergencies.
